summary: I am super excited about the coming summer at Nomura, where I will be joining as a risk management intern at New York Office.
I joined the company as Asset Managament Intern, where I applied the risk management, portfolio management and asset allocation skills to help optimize out client's return

I did an 6 months long Co-op program at HSBC Hong Kong. I worked in the Financial Institution Credit Risk Team. My responsibility lies in supporting the request approval, annual risk review, and internal team process automation.

At Deloitte, I joined the Risk Advisory, Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) group as the summer intern at Beijing Office. I worked with the team to provide ESG solutions for our clients and helped them become sustainable.
